lead_paragraph: The Olympic flame for the Rio de Janeiro Games came to the United Nations in Geneva on Friday, where officials said a team of refugee athletes will bring a message of hope for refugees around the world.

headline.print_headline: Rio Olympic Flame Visits UN Office in Geneva
headline.main: Rio Olympic Flame Visits UN Office in Geneva
